sources.title: Windbag the Sailor
sources.description: Captain Ben Cutlet (Will Hay) likes to spin yarns about all of his {fake} seafaring adventures, one day his false past comes to bite him as he is bluffed into captaining the Rob Roy at sea, the Rob Roy being barely sea worthy and doomed to be wrecked by a crafty shipping agent.

metadata.Plot: A bragging sea captain's maritime experience actually extends to navigating a coal barge down inland waterways. His tall tales catch him out when he is coerced into commanding an unseaworthy ship by an unscrupulous shipping agent who means to have it wrecked.
metadata.Writer: Robert Stevenson, Leslie Arliss, Marriott Edgar
metadata.Actors: Will Hay, Moore Marriott, Graham Moffatt
